main.name: Bhavya Goyal
main.bio: I'm a sophomore at IIIT-K, pursuing my BTech in Computer Science Engineering with an interest in [Pentesting, Competitive Programming]. I have done some Full-Stack work in web and app development. Looking forward to connecting with people and learning new technologies.
